thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Super!
thread.title_full: Super! - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: meig80
title: Super!
text: My husband surprised me with this wonderful stay here and it was one of the best vacations ever we've ever had. Location unbeatable with the Arc so close by (we could see it from the room!) and metro and restaurants all minutes away. Staff were fantastic and helpful with eating out recommendations. The room was lovely and honestly cannot fault anything. Breakfast was great compared to other hotels we've stayed at too. Wonderful!
